item.title: Visualize climate anomalies
item.description: When we visualize precipitation and temperature anomalies, we simply use time series as bar graph indicating negative and positive values in red and blue. However, in order to have a better overview we need both anomalies in a single graph. In this way we could more easly answer the question of whether a particular season or month was dry-warm or wet-cold, and even compare these anomalies in the context of previous years.

item.title: Spatial Analysis of Daily Precipitation Concentration in Puerto Rico
